overview: Never limited to the present-day experience, noted professor of anthropology and archeology Dr. Dwayne L. Merry tours France the only way he knows how -- from the very beginning. Travel through time to prehistoric days in the Dordogne region, relive the Roman invasion, visit World War II battle sites and stroll into modern-day Paris, the city of romance. Discover the landmarks, culture and history that shaped the country into what it is today.
title: France: Dr. Merry's Nomad Travel
